sqlMap.select: select t3.id as classTimeId, t3.name as classTimeName, t2.id as logTypeId, t2.name as logTypeName, t1.date as date, t1.classId as classId, t1.startTime, t1.endTime, count(t1.id) as count FROM tb_log_info t1, tb_log_type t2, tb_class_time t3 where t1.classTimeId = t3.id and t1.typeId = t2.id and t1.date >= str_to_date(#start#,'%Y-%m-%d') and t1.date <= str_to_date(#end#,'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY t3.id,t3.name,t2.id,t2.name,t1.date,t1.classId,t1.startTime,t1.endTime order by t1.date desc
